item.title: Refresh databases that belongs to Availability Group using dbatools
item.description: Few days ago I was surfing on Twitter when dbatools asked about how it’s PowerShell module changed the way people work . Open and check the answers given by the community as there is really good stuff there! My turn I have shared one of my recipes related to database refreshes. You know, when the client says, “please restore this backup or the most recent backup on our instance.”. But what if the databases belong to an availability group?
